name: Elder Shadow Drake
description: The Elder Shadow Drake is a large dragon characterized by its chaotic evil alignment and formidable presence, featuring a menacing physique capable of seamless stealth in darkness.
memorable: Its Shadow Sight ability enables it to excel in dim light or darkness, making it a lethal ambusher despite its vulnerabilities.
goals: To dominate its territory and ambush intruders using stealth and surprise attacks.
relations: Often encountered alongside other draconic or shadowy creatures, may have minions or allies in the dark.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy locations where it can leverage its stealth abilities.
strengths: High Strength grants powerful physical attacks, coupled with the ability to become invisible and teleport in darkness.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and requires dim light or darkness to use its stealth abilities effectively.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with a strong bite that deals piercing damage and tail slaps for bludgeoning damage, plus a devastating area cold damage breath weapon.
most_powerful_ability: Stygian Breath creates a wide area of magical darkness that also inflicts cold damage, instilling fear and confusion in enemies.
senses: Possesses darkvision that allows it to see in darkness up to 120 feet and a passive Perception of 15, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, making it highly effective in stealthy combat scenarios.
additional_information: Immune to cold damage, making it resilient against certain attacks.
Can teleport with Shadow Step, providing exceptional mobility in combat.
Advantage on Perception checks in dim light or darkness due to Shadow Sight.
Uses Invisibility to reposition strategically before attacking.
Creates magical darkness with its Stygian Breath, disrupting visibility.
